text.text: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.

Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
Where there is love there is life.
Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.
A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
A man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.
Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
Do all things with love.
We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.

Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
The first duty of love is to listen.
I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
Love is a better teacher than duty.
The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires.
Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
The best proof of love is trust.
Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
Love is a game that two can play and both win.
We loved with a love that was more than love.
Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.

Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.
The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.
True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
Who, being loved, is poor?
We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
The giving of love is an education in itself.
'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
Everything is clearer when you're in love.
I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
You never lose by loving. You always lose by holding back.
We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
Don't brood. Get on with living and loving. You don't have forever.
All mankind love a lover.

The hours I spend with you I look upon as sort of a perfumed garden, a dim twilight, and a fountain singing to it. You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee and thou art enough.

Someday, after mastering the winds, the waves, the tides and gravity, we shall harness for God the energies of love, and then, for a second time in the history of the world, man will have discovered fire.
Love is a friendship set to music.
Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.
Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.
The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.
There is no remedy for love but to love more.
To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'
The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.
One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.
You will find as you look back upon your life that the moments when you have truly lived are the moments when you have done things in the spirit of love.
Love is the beauty of the soul.
If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.

I was about half in love with her by the time we sat down. That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty... you fall half in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are.
Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
Only do what your heart tells you.
Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
The more one judges, the less one loves.
To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.
Before I met my husband, I'd never fallen in love. I'd stepped in it a few times.
The love we give away is the only love we keep.
It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
What love we've given, we'll have forever. What love we fail to give, will be lost for all eternity.
Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
If you want to be loved, be lovable.
When love is not madness, it is not love.
It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
Love is being stupid together.
Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it.
Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
We can only learn to love by loving.
To love another person is to see the face of God.
It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
People think love is an emotion. Love is good sense.
The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
Absence - that common cure of love.
Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
Be of love a little more careful than of anything.
How absurd and delicious it is to be in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it.
There is a woman at the begining of all great things.
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.
A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
If you can learn to love yourself and all the flaws, you can love other people so much better. And that makes you so happy.
If you wished to be loved, love.
Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.
Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
Choose your love, Love your choice.
Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
Love cures people - both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
Love is my religion - I could die for it.
Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.
There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
Love is the delusion that one woman differs from another.
Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
The way to know life is to love many things.
To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the gods.
As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you.
There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.
Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.
Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.
Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.
Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
He is not a lover who does not love forever.
Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
Friendship is Love without his wings!
There are never enough I Love You's.
Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.
Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.
Love is suffering. One side always loves more.
Down on your knees, and thank heaven, fasting, for a good man's love.
Love is what you've been through with somebody.
Fortune and love favor the brave.
Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
To love abundantly is to live abundantly, and to love forever is to live forever.
Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
Love is space and time measured by the heart.
Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.
Love conquers all.
I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
We may give without loving, but we cannot love without giving.
You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
Love is the poetry of the senses.
For love is immortality.
Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul.
The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
The fact is that love is of two kinds, one which commands, and one which obeys. The two are quite distinct, and the passion to which the one gives rise is not the passion of the other.
Sometimes it's hard to be a woman giving all your love to just one man.
No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
The journey from teaching about love to allowing myself to be loved proved much longer than I realised.
Love is always being given where it is not required.
Come live with me and be my love, And we will all the pleasures prove, That valleys, groves, hills, and fields, Woods, or steepy mountain yields.
If you do not love me I shall not be loved If I do not love you I shall not love.
Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
There is always something left to love. And if you ain't learned that, you ain't learned nothing.
To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Our first and last love is self-love.
Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow.

When you love a man, he becomes more than a body. His physical limbs expand, and his outline recedes, vanishes. He is rich and sweet and right. He is part of the world, the atmosphere, the blue sky and the blue water.
Though lovers be lost love shall not.
Love means not ever having to say you're sorry.
The quarrels of lovers are the renewal of love.
Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
Love is the only gold.
Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
Say what you will, 'tis better to be left than never to have been loved.

The truth is that there is only one terminal dignity - love. And the story of a love is not important - what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.
Romantic love is an illusion. Most of us discover this truth at the end of a love affair or else when the sweet emotions of love lead us into marriage and then turn down their flames.
Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
With our love, we could save the world.
What the world really needs is more love and less paper work.
Love is the word used to label the sexual excitement of the young, the habituation of the middle-aged, and the mutual dependence of the old.
Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
Love is metaphysical gravity.
Do you have to have a reason for loving?
In every living thing there is the desire for love.
Sympathy constitutes friendship; but in love there is a sort of antipathy, or opposing passion. Each strives to be the other, and both together make up one whole.
Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
There is more pleasure in loving than in being beloved.
What is love? It is the morning and the evening star.
It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
Who loves, raves.
We love because it's the only true adventure.

When you're in love you never really know whether your elation comes from the qualities of the one you love, or if it attributes them to her; whether the light which surrounds her like a halo comes from you, from her, or from the meeting of your sparks.
If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.
We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.
Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.
True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.
Ultimately love is everything.
When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.
To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
Who so loves believes the impossible.
Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.
There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
Stand by your man. Give him two arms to cling to and something warm to come to.
Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
There is no limit to the power of loving.
More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
When love is at its best, one loves so much that he cannot forget.
A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted.
Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.
To good and true love fear is forever affixed.
If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
Loving others always costs us something and requires effort. And you have to decide to do it on purpose. You can't wait for a feeling to motivate you.
You don't have to go looking for love when it's where you come from.
Love is blind.
The cure for all the ills and wrongs, the cares, the sorrows, and the crimes of humanity, all lie in the one word 'love'. It is the divine vitality that everywhere produces and restores life.
In a full heart there is room for everything, and in an empty heart there is room for nothing.
In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.
We love but once, for once only are we perfectly equipped for loving.
Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
Love ceases to be a pleasure when it ceases to be a secret.
Love is love's reward.
The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.
All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.
Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.
Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?
Love is much nicer to be in than an automobile accident, a tight girdle, a higher tax bracket or a holding pattern over Philadelphia.
Is it not by love alone that we succeed in penetrating to the very essence of being?
Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
But love's a malady without a cure.
We perceive when love begins and when it declines by our embarrassment when alone together.
Self-love is the source of all our other loves.
I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.
Love alone could waken love.
Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
My wife, my family, my friends - they've all taught me things about love and what that emotion really means. In a nutshell, loving someone is about giving, not receiving.
Love is a hole in the heart.
No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.
To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.

You don't want to love - your eternal and abnormal craving is to be loved. You aren't positive, you're negative. You absorb, absorb, as if you must fill yourself up with love, because you've got a shortage somewhere.
Bid me to love, and I will give a loving heart to thee.
I am happier when I love than when I am loved. I adore my husband, my son, my grandchildren, my mother, my dog, and frankly, I don't know if they even like me. But who cares? Loving them is my joy.
Touch seems to be as essential as sunlight.
The love which moves the world, according to common Christian belief, is God's love and the love of God.
One must not trifle with love.
The deep joy we take in the company of people with whom we have just recently fallen in love is undisguisable.
Love has a tide!
The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
All love is lost but upon God alone.
Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.

We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.

I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.
When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry; to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.
It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
To love beauty is to see light.
The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant.
There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
If music be the food of love, play on.
All major religious traditions carry basically the same message, that is love, compassion and forgiveness the important thing is they should be part of our daily lives.
Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
I love you when you bow in your mosque, kneel in your temple, pray in your church. For you and I are sons of one religion, and it is the spirit.
Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.
It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can keep him from lynching me, and I think that's pretty important.
At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love.
If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
It is not enough to say we must not wage war. It is necessary to love peace and sacrifice for it.
Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.
People love chopping wood. In this activity one immediately sees results.

Have we not come to such an impasse in the modern world that we must love our enemies - or else? The chain reaction of evil - hate begetting hate, wars producing more wars - must be broken, or else we shall be plunged into the dark abyss of annihilation.
Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.

You can't stop loving or wanting to love because when its right it's the best thing in the world. When you're in a relationship and its good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.
I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
Before marriage, a girl has to make love to a man to hold him. After marriage, she has to hold him to make love to him.

Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
I say what I want to say and do what I want to do. There's no in between. People will either love you for it or hate you for it.
Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
If you want a love message to be heard, it has got to be sent out. To keep a lamp burning, we have to keep putting oil in it.
If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go.
Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace. Money will come if we seek first the Kingdom of God - the rest will be given.

Be Impeccable With Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
Even the rich are hungry for love, for being cared for, for being wanted, for having someone to call their own.
The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
The course of true love never did run smooth.
Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
